content:
1275 
 
SPECIAL EDUCATION/HOME ECONOMICS  
(DOUBLE MAJOR)  
    
   FCS-OYO     
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Home Economics and any two (2) of 
the followings: Home Management, Biology, 
Chemistry, Needle and Dress Making.  
  
Any three (3) of Biology, Chemistry, General  
Science, Economics, Mathematics and Commerce.  
  
SPECIAL EDUCATION/INTEGRATED SCIENCE  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics and any three (3) Science subjects.  
Any three (3) subjects from Biology, Agricultural 
Science, Physics, Chemistry and General Science.  
 
PROGRAMMES/COURSES AVAILABLE AT THE NIGERIA CERTIFICATE IN EDUCATION (NCE) LEVEL AND THE REQUIREMENTS FOR EACH 
COURSE  
COLLEGE/COURSE  COURSE REQUIREMENTS  UTME SUBJECTS  
DUTSINMA FCS-
OYO  
    
SPECIAL EDUCATION/ISLAMIC STUDIES   
  
ANISE  
FCS-OYO  
FC-ZARIA  
MINNA  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Islamic Studies and any two (2) Arts 
subjects.  
  
Islamic Studies and any two (2) Arts subjects.  
  
SPECIAL EDUCATION/MATHEMATICS  
  
FCS-OYO  
MINNA  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics and any three (3) Science subjects.  
  
Any three (3) of Mathematics, Physics/Chemistry, 
General Science/Biology.  
  
SPECIAL EDUCATION/MUSIC  
  
FCS-OYO    
  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics and any three (3) Arts subjects.  
  
Any three (3) Arts subjects.  
  
SPECIAL EDUCATION/PHYSICAL AND HEALTH  
EDUCATION  
    
FCS-OYO  
MINNA  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics and any three (3) of the followings: 
Biology, Chemistry, General Science, Health 
Science, Agricultural Science and any other 
subject.  
  
One (1) Science subject and any other two (2) 
subjects.
